dcterms:creator: R. Gupta
S. Desai
M. Goel
A. Bandhakavi
T. Chakraborty
M. S. Akhtar
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset comprising 13, 952 counterspeech instances across four distinct intents: positive, informative, questioning, and denouncing. It addresses key limitations of the original dataset, ensuring an average of four counterspeeches per hate speech and improving content quality.
dcterms:title: IntentCONANv2

dcterms:creator: W. Zhou
Y. Jiang
E. Wilcox
R. Cotterell
M. Sachan
dcterms:description: A dataset of offensive statements paired with free-text explanations along seven pragmatic frames of hate speech, including intent, target group, power dynamics, impact, emotional reaction, cognitive reaction, and offensiveness.
dcterms:title: COBRACORPUS
